biolockj.module.implicit

Class RegisterNumReads

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.JavaModuleImpl
          • biolockj.module.implicit.RegisterNumReads
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, JavaModule, ScriptModule, SeqModule, Comparable<BioModule>

    public class RegisterNumReads
extends JavaModuleImpl
implements JavaModule, SeqModule
    This BioModule parses sequence file to count the number of reads per sample. The data is stored in a new column Num_Reads. If no metadata file exists, it is created with 2 columns: SampleID and Num_Reads.

      • runModule

        public void runModule()
               throws Exception
        Register number of reads for each sample by parsing each file and counting number of lines. Add "Num_Reads" column to metadata and refresh the cache.
        Specified by:
        runModule in interface JavaModule
        Specified by:
        runModule in class JavaModuleImpl
        Throws:
